defaultCompanies.summary: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington. It develops, manufactures, licenses, supports and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.

Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. It is considered one of the Big Four of technology along with Amazon, Google, and Facebook.

defaultStudents.summary: Hi I am a computer science student with 3 years of programming experience. I love working with people and I would like to work on a fantastic team!
Hi, I am undeclared and I dropped out after a semester, but I am working on my startup and need a job to help fund it.
